sentences.en: A clerk simply verifies that the payment and invoice amount match.
sentences.cn: 职员只是核实付款和发票上的数额是否一致。

sentences.en: Can a hotel use the VAT invoice to rent guest rooms?
sentences.cn: 酒店客房可以使用增值税发票 吗 ?

sentences.en: His £200 invoice was settled immediately in cash.
sentences.cn: 他立即以现金付清了200英镑的货款。

sentences.en: I want to apply for carving a special invoice stamp.
sentences.cn: 我要申请雕刻发票专用章.

sentences.en: I want to purchase five special invoice books of service trades.
sentences.cn: 我要购领五本服务业发票.

sentences.en: Please insure the goods for 110 % of the invoice value.
sentences.cn: 请按发票金额110%给这批货物投保.

sentences.en: Put these invoice in numerical order.
sentences.cn: 把这些发票按其号码顺序放好.

sentences.en: The agency invoices the client who then pays the full amount to the agency.
sentences.cn: 那个代销处给客户开具发票，然后客户向代销处支付全部的款项。

sentences.en: The invoice has the stamp ` received with thanks'on it.
sentences.cn: 收据上盖有"已收讫,谢谢 " 字样的章.

sentences.en: The seller has to issue a tax invoice.
sentences.cn: 销售者必须开具税务发票.

sentences.en: The shipping costs can be as high as 50 % of the invoice value of the goods.
sentences.cn: 货运费用最高可以达到货物发票金额的50%.
我们向该发票多付了245美元.

sentences.en: We will be pleased to delete the charge from the original invoice.
sentences.cn: 我们决定将这笔费用从原始发票上删去。

sentences.en: We will then send you an invoice for the total course fees.
sentences.cn: 然后我们会把全部课程费用的发票寄给你。

sentences.en: You should use the required special nationwide invoice stamp.
